website_summaries.verdict: Eradicates dark circles as its key focus but it is also nourishing for the eye area.
pros: The product is rich with emollients which are known for softening and making skin smooth
This cream is like an elixir for fixing dark circles under your eyes due to the rich texture of the cream
cons: It would be more useful in a tube instead of a jar
Too thick and greasy for use during the day

customer_reviews.title: Amazing stuff man
customer_reviews.text: My girlfriend suggested to use this because my eyes looked haggard AF. This is amazing made a huge difference!!! Yeah it’s expensive but you get what you pay for
customer_reviews.author: jkmee24

customer_reviews.title: Hydrating under eye product
customer_reviews.text: Great product for super dry under eye area. It is thick, so I only use it at night. I am prone to developing milia, but don’t have that problem when using this cream. I mostly use it in dry weather. It is great to have handy. A little goes a long way.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Not a sensitive skin choice !
customer_reviews.text: I wish I can love this product because it’s so moisturizing and I did see my eyes look brighter , however it has WHEAT in it and I’m allergic to gluten and my eyes get super itchy. Not good for sensitive skin!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Witkowski

customer_reviews.title: LOVE. THIS
customer_reviews.text: I. LOVE. THIS . STUFF!! This is by far the very best eye cream! I apply night and day. It is great under concealer! I have really dry skin under my eyes and this cream really does help decrease the crepey skin there.
customer_reviews.author: L. Cook

customer_reviews.title: A game changer!
customer_reviews.text: I buy jars of this product because I use it a couple times a day. I am over 50 and staving off wrinkles is a top priority. This product is thick enough to do it.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia B.

customer_reviews.title: Great eye cream
customer_reviews.text: Good quality. Pricey but last along time. Best eye cream I have found. Doesn’t burn!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Bogan

customer_reviews.title: Haven't notice any difference
customer_reviews.text: This is expensive. It is not worth the price just use vaseline. It is heavy greasy cream and I haven't notice any change in 2 weeks
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Women over 50 need this!
customer_reviews.text: Expensive and worth every penny...if you are in Canada... nickel. Treat it like the precious elixir it is....it may be all you need around the eyes!
customer_reviews.author: Klea Scott

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: This eye cream is a holy grail product! I've been using it for 4 years and I've only had to buy 3 jars of it. So although it's a little pricey it lasts a very long time! It doesn't bother my eyes at all like some other eye creams can do. I think I'll forever use this stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa M

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best eye cream I have ever tried. There are is one from Michael Todd that I hear is better...but so far this is my HG!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I have always stuggled with my dark circles and was very tiered of people asking me if I was tiered..lol...this cream is amazing I have not been asked that since i've been using this product. It made a huge difference. LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.author: Jan

customer_reviews.title: Something very suspicious about this product in this package
customer_reviews.text: Something was wrong the moment I open this package the packaging rate of an acrid smell the packaging looked recycled it was not sealed with the factory clear seal as I am used to. I’ve been a long-time user of Bobby a Bobby Brown products. I have probably purchased this ice cream over 20 times. Something is very suspicious about this product in this package
customer_reviews.author: SMB

customer_reviews.title: Best Eye Cream Ever!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve tried a lot of eye creams and this one is the best. It’s very rich, so a little goes a long way. I use it twice a day on both my upper and lower lids and the wrinkles on my upper lid are 80% better. I have small bags under my eyes which get better an hour or so after the cream. This could happen naturally, I don’t know. The product is expensive, but I really think it’s fabulous and worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer.p cohen

customer_reviews.title: Didn't help me
customer_reviews.text: I think that people need to understand the cause of their dark circles and puffy eyes. If it's due to "fat pads" under the eye, no cream is going to help. This cream is expensive and did not do anything that cheaper versions have done, which is really nothing. It might work for some, but not for me.
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Best Eye Cream
customer_reviews.text: This is an ongoing repeat item for me. Rare eye cream which does not irritate my sensitive eye area. Very moisturizing. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Merry Bear

customer_reviews.title: Really moisturizing
customer_reviews.text: I really like this. Have tried different products for the eyes and always come back to Bobbi Brown
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product the difference is immediately noticeable
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product the difference is immediately noticeable.Is like having a magic little secret for a refreshing look it work wonders specially when traveling.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting and nourishing
customer_reviews.text: Update 1/29/2015: This eye cream is only good for me on occasion, only during the most dry winters in California. I break out around my eye if I use it daily. I only use it sparingly, a half an eye drop size dab around my eyes will do. Worked great for me in the mountains though. You need so little. Just a tiny dab on your fingertip, and rub it around the eye. It is perfect for my overnight eye cream. Sometimes I use it in the day, but I have combo oily skin so I don't use it all the time. I can really see the difference and the skin around my eye areas are soft.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Suen

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Only thing that works under my eyes with the harsh dry winds!
customer_reviews.author: GT

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: Best eye cream on the market! And a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Cope121

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: It is a great moisturizer. I put this on before bed every night. I do not put it on the eye area before I put on my makeup due to the tacky texture.Once it warms to you body temp it will leave a bit of an oily film, which I like before bed because it hydrates.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna

customer_reviews.title: Bobbie Brown Eye Cream
customer_reviews.text: Have been using this for years. It is perfect for wearing under concealer or by itself. It moisturizers the thin skin under the eyes. I use it morning and night.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Mmmm!
customer_reviews.text: I love it! You need so little, the jar should last a lifetime:) It is very much worth the $$.
customer_reviews.author: Katharine A. Sokoloff

customer_reviews.title: My favorite eyecream to date.
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the most moisturizing eye cream I've ever used. I have dry sensitive skin and I'm in my forties. This cream has taken 10 years off face! People tell me I look like I'm no older than 30.
customer_reviews.author: civanderson

customer_reviews.title: You want an eye treatment kind of moisturizer?! ...
customer_reviews.text: You want an eye treatment kind of moisturizer?! Splurge in this eye cream, because it really works and let met tell you, it will last you for months. So, why not to splurge in something that really works and last long?!
customer_reviews.author: Shatha

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff, but very thick.
customer_reviews.text: This stuff works really well---however, it's super thick and sits on top of your skin for a while. I wound up rubbing it in with a couple drops of facial oil, and that dissolved it and helped it soak in better. Despite all that, great results. Keeps the area around my eyes looking bright and firm.
customer_reviews.author: Cassie

customer_reviews.title: Decent product
customer_reviews.text: This product is just okay. The consistency is thicker than many of the other eye creams I've used, and therefore it takes a bit longer to pat into your skin and absorb thoroughly. While I didn't notice any huge differences using this product, the skin under my eyes seems smoother and brighter. I would repurchase this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Bobbi Brown Extra Eye Repair Cream, 0.5 Ounce
product_meta.description: This rich, concentrated cream visibly revives eyes-so you look extra well rested. This formula with peptides, natural plant oils, and humectants targets fine lines, wrinkles, dark circles, puffiness, and dryness.
